about_the_game:
This Digital Deluxe DLC of Planets under Attack combines the most beautiful visual impressions from the game, allowing an entertaining short trip into the wonderful world of Planets under Attack. It includes a 32-pages digital artbook, 10 full HD wallpaper, a printable poster in 297x420mm and 27 Avatars in different resolutions.

Digital Deluxe Content:

  • Digital Artbook (32 pages, PDF)
  • Game Poster in 297x420mm (PDF in 300dpi printable for private usage)
  • 10 wallpapers in resolutions of 1920x1080 and 1920x1200 pixels
  • 27 avatars in the following resolutions: 512x512, 256x256, 128x128, 96x96, 80x80, 72x72 and 64x64

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP SP2 / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor:1.5 GHz Single Core CPU
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:Graphics card with Shader 3.0 support and 128 MB RAM
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:300 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows XP SP2 / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64x2
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Graphics card with Shader 3.0 support and 256 MB RAM
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:300 MB HD space

short_description: The Digital Deluxe DLC of Planets under Attack includes a 32-page digital art book, 10 full HD wallpapers, a poster in A3 format (297x420 mm) and 27 avatars in different resolutions.
